item.title: Svg Masks
item.description: Today after some pain learned how to create a mask to “carve” a hole with a given shape <html> <body style="background: url('https://64.media.tumblr.com/7bed8273f621486faecdd407969aef51/tumblr_otfcxeacdO1slhhf0o1_1280.jpg') center center / cover no-repeat;"> <svg className="text-demo" viewBox="0 0 600 400" width="600" height="400"> <defs> <mask id="text-mask"> <rect width="100%" height="100%" fill="white" /> <text x="60" y="220" id="mySubtext" style="font-size: 150px; font-weight: bold;"> A Mask </text> </mask> </defs> <ellipse cx="300" cy="200" rx="300" ry="150" fill="white" mask="url(#text-mask)" /> </svg> </body> </html>
